Package com.soebes.itf.jupiter.extension

Annotation Type MavenIT

  • @Target(TYPE)
@Retention(RUNTIME)
@ExtendWith(MavenITExtension.class)
@Documented
@API(status=EXPERIMENTAL,
     since="0.1.0")
public @interface MavenIT
    This annotation defines the base to run any kind of integration tests.

    This also defines defines some useful defaults.

    Author:
    Karl Heinz Marbaise

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element Description
      boolean debug
      This can be used to activate debugging output within the maven build -X option.
      java.lang.String[] goals
      Defines the goals which are being executed by default for all test cases within the class.

    • Element Detail

      • goals

        java.lang.String[] goals
        Defines the goals which are being executed by default for all test cases within the class.
        Returns:
        The default goals which is executed is package.
        Default:
        {"package"}

      • debug

        boolean debug
        This can be used to activate debugging output within the maven build -X option.
        Returns:
        true or false
        Default:
        false
